Comment: Absolutely wild how the same people who claim to fight for "the little guy" are pushing policies that end up squeezing working-class families while the ultra-rich keep cashing in. Tariffs like these punish *us*.   If we really cared about American workers, we’d be investing in fair wages, education, affordable healthcare, not playing billionaire chess games with global economies. Let’s stop pretending this is about patriotism.  We need policies that lift everyone up, not just the ones already at the top.
